data.note: PV modules: As part of the CEMAC trade zone, import duties are set for the trade region as a whole. Import duties range from 5% for primary goods, to 30% for consumption goods. Solar lanterns: Tariff for general portable lamp category. Batteries: Import duties are Lead-acid batteries only face a 10% import duty, while other battery types go up to 20% and 30%.
data.name: Import duties
